articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said a digital currency issued by the U.S. Central Bank is ‘a very important potential financial innovation.’
articles.title: Powell: Congress to Receive Guidance from Federal Reserve on CBDC

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The upscale fashion designer joins the likes of Gucci, Prada, and Balmain embracing NFTs.
articles.title: Fashion Brand Salvatore Ferragamo Opens Ethereum NFT Booth in NYC

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The video for ‘From The D 2 The LBC’ features the hip-hop legends’ Bored Ape Yacht Club PFPs in animated form.
articles.title: Snoop Dogg and Eminem Become Bored Apes in New Music Video

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: If previous downturns are any indication, the energy consumption of the Bitcoin network could fall further still.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Energy Consumption Drops By A Quarter Following Crypto Crash

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Axie Infinity's Ronin sidechain is expected to be relaunched next week after the $552 million exploit, 'with all user funds returned.'
articles.title: Axie Infinity's Ronin Bridge to Re-Open After $552M Hack

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: It’s not crypto winter at Binance, as the world’s biggest crypto exchange launches a platform for institutional investors.
articles.title: Binance Launches Institutional Platform for VIP High Rollers

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ratings agency Moody’s has downgraded cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase’s corporate debt, placing its ratings under scrutiny for additional downgrades.
articles.title: Coinbase Downgraded by Moody's Due To 'Substantially Weaker Revenue'

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Horizon has become the latest cross-chain bridge to be hit by an exploit, after hackers stole $100 million in altcoins.
articles.title: Harmony Plunges 10% After Horizon Ethereum Bridge Hacked For $100 Million

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Scams and phishing attacks continue to plague Web3 developers, costing the industry over $1 billion.
articles.title: Chatsight Pivots Its Content Moderation A.I. to Battling Discord Scammers

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Formerly called FairX, Coinbase Derivatives Exchange will offer futures priced at 1/100th of a Bitcoin through third-party brokers beginning Monday.
articles.title: Coinbase Launching 'Nano' Bitcoin Futures via Derivatives Exchange

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Many pro athletes are diving headfirst into crypto and NFTs, and the Portuguese professional footballer is joining them.
articles.title: Soccer Superstar Cristiano Ronaldo Is Making NFTs for Binance

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Stepn's CMO joined the gm podcast to talk about the app's rapid growth, its tokenomics, and what it all says about the future of NFTs with utility.
articles.title: 'Strava Meets Pokémon Go': Stepn Has 3 Million Users, But Its Token Is Down 97%

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Meta and 34 other tech companies signed a pledge this week to work towards creating an open and interoperable metaverse. But leading voices in crypto aren't convinced.
articles.title: Meta, Microsoft and Other Tech Giants Say They Want an Open Metaverse—Should We Believe Them?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The crypto evangelist was found dead in a Spanish prison last year after years on the run from U.S. authorities.
articles.title: John McAfee's Widow Still Seeking Independent Autopsy One Year After Husband’s Death

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: CoinFLEX joins Celsius, Babel Finance, Finblox, and Voyager Digital in either freezing or limiting user withdrawals. Who’s next?
articles.title: Crypto Exchange CoinFLEX Freezes Withdrawals Due to Counterparty 'Uncertainty'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Solana Mobile Stack will enable more mobile Web3 apps, plus Solana Labs will launch its own smartphone in early 2023.
articles.title: Solana Labs Launches Mobile Platform, Reveals Android Smartphone

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The trading platform has reduced withdrawals limits to $10k from $25k following news of its involvement with the embattled Three Arrows Capital.
articles.title: Three Arrows-Exposed Voyager Digital Slashes Daily Withdrawal Limit by More Than 50%

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Two years after Venezuelan users first reported issues with Uphold following expanded U.S. sanctions, the exchange officially closes its doors to the South American nation.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Uphold Cuts Off Venezuela Due to 'Complexity' of US Sanctions

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: As well as launching two new crypto programs, the Ohio-based university will add a lab space dedicated to cryptocurrency partnerships.
articles.title: University of Cincinnati Adds Crypto Courses to Curriculum

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon insists he has always believed in the resilience of the Terra ecosystem.
articles.title: Terra's Do Kwon: 'There Is a Difference Between Failing and Running a Fraud'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The league has tapped Sweet to build a marketplace that will include gamified NFTs.
articles.title: NHL Launching NFT Marketplace for Hockey Collectibles

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The latest crypto slump could be decisive in determining the industry’s future winners, according to Bank of England deputy governor Jon Cunliffe.
articles.title: Bank of England Deputy Governor: Crypto Crash Survivors Could Become Tomorrow's 'Amazons and eBays'

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The blockchain analytics firm has created a 24-hour hotline for businesses that have fallen victim to crypto crimes such as ransomware attacks.
articles.title: Chainalysis Launches Crypto Crime Incident Response Program

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Ethereum layer 2 scaling solution Polygon claims to have achieved carbon neutrality through offsetting carbon credits.
articles.title: Polygon's MATIC Up 20% Amid Whale Accumulation, Carbon Neutrality Push

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The standalone service will be replaced by Advanced Trade, a feature within the main Coinbase app.
articles.title: Coinbase to Phase Out Trader-Friendly ‘Pro’ Exchange

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: One of the first NFT marketplaces, KnownOrigin has generated almost $8 million since launching in 2018.
articles.title: EBay Snaps Up NFT Marketplace KnownOrigin

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Murray’s son Jackson tells Decrypt about the actor’s new NFT project, which bundles infamous stories with in-person events and other perks.
articles.title: Why Bill Murray Is Making Ethereum NFTs About His Life

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The e-commerce platform is allowing brands to make their shops more exclusive.
articles.title: Shopify Adds NFT-Gated Option for Online Retailers

articles.description: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.
articles.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The pound-pegged GBPT is set to join USDT, EURT, CHNT, and MXNT as Tether’s fifth stablecoin tied to a fiat currency.
articles.title: Tether to Launch Stablecoin Pegged to British Pound Sterling

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The game’s publisher, Mythical Games, also just released two other play-to-earn titles and is working with the NFL on its own NFT game.
articles.title: Blankos Block Party NFT Game to Launch on Epic Games Store

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Both crypto markets and traditional equity markets have taken a beating in 2022.
articles.title: Powell Sees No ‘Macroeconomic Implications’ From Bitcoin Price Swings, But ‘Better Regulatory Framework’ Still Needed

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: If public Bitcoin miners sell large portions of their supply, "it could contribute to pushing the Bitcoin price further down," says crypto data firm Arcane Research.
articles.title: Public Bitcoin Miners Are Selling Off BTC Reserves as Crypto Winter Sets In

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: European Central Bank president Christine Lagarde argued for more regulation of the crypto space, covering lending and staking.
articles.title: ECB President Lagarde: Crypto Staking and Lending Must Be Regulated

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: But central banks are very keen to develop and control their own cryptocurrencies.
articles.title: BIS: Crypto's 'Structural Flaws' Make It Unsuitable as Basis for Monetary System

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cryptocurrency broker Voyager Digital has warned it may issue a "notice of default" to Three Arrows Capital.
articles.title: Voyager Digital Plummets 60% After Revealing $661M Exposure To 3AC

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: A report from blockchain analytics firm Elliptic points to the increasing use of Dogecoin by criminals as payment for illegal activity.
articles.title: Dogecoin Worth Millions Linked To Illicit Activity Including Terrorism: Elliptic

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The move comes as part of an effort to “help our market and customers in a time of need,” CEO Brian Shroder said.
articles.title: Binance US Eliminating Fees on Bitcoin Trades

articles.description: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.
articles.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: At Brussels Blockchain Week, crypto enthusiasts met in the shadow of impending regulation—but the regulators themselves were few and far between.
articles.title: European Commission Advisor: ‘We’re Currently Not on Track to Regulate DeFi’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: A former senior manager at crypto exchange Huobi allegedly made around $5 million by trading against his own company.
articles.title: Former Huobi Senior Manager Accused of Illicit Trading: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The valuable NFT collection adds a famous face and fresh funding, plus announces plans for Doodles 2 avatars.
articles.title: Doodles NFTs Announces Pharrell as Chief Brand Officer, Fundraise Led by Alexis Ohanian

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.
articles.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA

articles.description: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.
articles.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto

articles.description: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.
articles.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?

articles.description: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.
articles.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”
articles.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch

articles.description: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.
articles.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT

articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.
articles.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy

articles.description: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.
articles.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis

articles.description: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.
articles.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
articles.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project

articles.description: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.
articles.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
